This was a decent game until the community began to turn toxic. Many killers find it fun to either target a particular survivor the entire match or camp around hooks while certain survivors choose to teabag or act nasty to a killer after a loss instead of being friendly and offering a gg message. Kinda sad to see how the playerbase is now composed of toxicity and barely any good times versus back then. Do not get me wrong though. I have had a few games where I have met nice and funny people; but that was only a very small amount of matches. Hopefully this gets better in like twenty years. 
The devs do not care about their playerbase and barely listen to anyone too. They seem to be more set on ignoring a ton of issues and just releasing new dlcs for revenue. Since money is clearly more important than bringing up a inviting playerbase with next to zero hackers and solving eminent balancing problems? Yeah alright then. 
Only buy the game is you are willing to put up with the bad playerbase or have three other friends to play with. And avoid playing too much that you rank up a lot because ranking up just means that you have less fun than you already have from owning this game.

Verfolge das Spiel schon sehr lange und hab es mir auch vor kurzem geholt. Ich kann es nur weiterempfehlen, da man halt einfach sehr viel SpaÃŸ hat. Also holt euch dieses Spiel erstrecht fÃ¼r das Angebot von 8 â‚¬.

This game can be fun, but based off of post-chat  I feel like the community (like most games) are overtaken by children (man-children included).  Post-game chat is usually pretty toxic as it is entertaining, getting called slurs and a "bed wetter" is pretty funny.  Not that it takes away any points from the game itself, but anytime I can make a child pout over a video-game makes me laugh at what other unrealized struggles they'll have ahead of their tiny little lives.  Premise of the game is easy.  If playing killer: sacrifice children on Meathook, win, get cussed at by children.  If playing survivor: Repair 5 Generators, escape through gate or hatch, get cussed at by children. Updates change and re-balance many of the character perks and items so if you'll need to be on top of that if you want to know what's the OP build.  Overall pretty fun and also it's one of the few games my mom lets me play because it doesn't have guns.
Great fun

Sehr einfaches Spielprinzip, welches mit Skill umgesetzt werden muss. Im Grunde immer das gleiche aber dennoch sehr abwechslungsreich! Macht einfach SpaÃŸ und sollte jeder Horrorfan einmal ausprobiert haben. Ab un an treten kleinere Bugs auf, welche aber immer wieder gefixt werden. 
Overall kann man nur wenig negatives aber viel positives sagen.
git
Dead by Daylight

Having developers who're still working on updating, adding new content & improving the game along with crossplay between all platforms makes the game sound very appealing but like most other games it has some issues to keep in mind when running through matches, like how the community that keeps this game alive by sinking hundreds if not thousands of hours is filled with the most hypocritical & emotionally unstable people who seem to always find something (or someone) to complain about. My advice would be to not to take others too seriously & take a step back if things are getting too frustrating, I'd also recommend if you're playing survivor it'd be best to find others to play with instead of playing by yourself.

Overall I would recommend this title for people who're looking for something different compared to the kinds of games that have released in recent years but wouldn't recommend for those who don't have thick skin & get upset fairly easily in response to toxicity.
